snippet: United States District Judge Ricardo S. Martinez declined to issue an emergency order Wednesday that would allow thousands of skilled immigrants to immediately apply to become permanent residents.
abstract: United States District Judge Ricardo S Martinez in Washington State refuses to issue emergency order reinstating October 1 deadline for skilled immigrants to file for permanent residency; federal officials had unexpectedly revised deadline for filing greencard paperwork to September 25, severely limiting those who could apply.
lead_paragraph: United States District Judge Ricardo S. Martinez declined to issue an emergency order Wednesday that would allow thousands of skilled immigrants to immediately apply to become permanent residents.
